pageProps.title: Set variables such as CFLAGS in CMake project
pageProps.author: bebrws

source.renderedOutput:
Easy alternative way to set CFLAGS in the output from CMake

Edit the CMakeLists.txt file and add a line with your flags such as:

set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-I/usr/local/include/")

scope.title: Set variables such as CFLAGS in CMake project
scope.author: bebrws
